managementResponses.response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at the Hilton Garden Inn.  We are happy to hear your family enjoyed their stay.

review.title: Good family hotel

managementResponses.response: We are happy to hear you felt our hotel was perfect for a short stay!

review.title: Perfect for a short stay
review.reviewText: Room was clean and large. Staff were helpful. It ts a fair way to the city though and we used uber in and out for around $ US 25

managementResponses.response: Thanks for the great review Mark!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed the relaxing environment and hotel staff.

review.title: Great team, nothing too much trouble
review.reviewText: Loved my stay at the Hotel.  Staff great, rooms clean and comfortable and terrific environment to relax and enjoy.
review.locationRemarks: Close to SFO and the BART for 30 minute train trip downtown.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for commenting on your recent stay Nee.  We are happy to hear you found the hotel safe and clean and the front desk staff friendly.

review.title: This was a convenient airport hotel.
review.reviewText: Friendly front desk. Safe & clean. A little out of the way from main SF: thus not for those looking to hop downtown. A decent hotel.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for commenting on your recent stay.  We are happy to hear you found our location convenient while enjoying the Bay Area.

review.title: Excellent hotel for staying outside the city
review.reviewText: Great hotel. Walking distance to South City restaurants. Easy shuttle and access to BART and Bay Area transit. Quiet and good breakfast. Super helpful staff. 25 min by car to downtown SF and free parking.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for choosing the Hilton Garden Inn.  We appreciate your comments regarding the friendliness of the staff and happy to hear you found the room comfortable and spacious.

review.reviewText:
Great staff, very friendly. Our room was very spacious, light filled and the King sized bed was comfortable. Nice lounge downstairs and excellent breakfast and dinner.
Being an industrial area we found it lacked shopping opportunities.

managementResponses.response: We appreciate your feedback and happy to hear you found the staff friendly and helpful!

review.reviewText: Extremely friendly and helpful staff always tried to make sure we enjoyed our stay.

review.title: Close to airport and City
review.reviewText: I only stayed one night but the experience was good.
review.positiveRemarks: Location, clean, and staff was very helpful

managementResponses.response: Thank you for commenting on your recent stay.  We are sorry to hear the wait for the shuttle was long.  Your feedback is appreciated.

review.reviewText: Good location for our needs. Fairly long wait for shuttle after our arrival

managementResponses.response: Thank you for choosing the Hilton Garden Inn!  We are happy to hear you found the hotel staff friendly and enjoyed the amenities.

review.title: Hotel with friendly service, extra amendaties
review.reviewText:
As always the Hotel Staff was great. The lobby has the newspaper, coffee, etc. available,
A special touch is the chocolate chip cookies for the evening snack!
review.locationRemarks:
Good hotel near the airport with shuttle service.
You need a car or other transportation to go places.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay.  We are glad you had a great experience and found the staff friendly and the room clean.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Great experience here. Friendly staff, clean rooms and fresh choc chip cookies daily. Quiet location, couldn't hear planes although close to airport. Short drive downtown. Lots of local places to eat.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for sharing your comments regarding your recent stay.  We are sorry to learn you had an unpleasant encounter with one of the managers as well as experienced the inconvenience of maintenance related issues.  We take the satisfaction of all of our guests very seriously and appreciate your feedback.

review.title: Managers very unprofessional
review.reviewText:
The night manager was extremely rude and unprofessional.
The desk clerks were very professional and friendly.
Did not have internet in our first room and had to be moved.
The next room didn't have hot water the first night and one of our keys didn't work in the door.
The rooms were nice - they had been recently renovated.
Walls were paper thin and people in the hallway and other rooms sounded like they were in the room with you.
Good location - easy 10 or 15 mins to Fishermans Wharf.
Had to pay $11 a day to park in their parking lot.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for reviewing your stay Rina!  We are happy to hear you found the rooms clean and spacious as well as the staff friendly.

review.title: Good hotel, clase to attractions.
review.reviewText: Clean, rooms very spacious, friendly personnel. Parking available at not extra cost. Flexibility at check out time.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay!  We are happy to hear you found our newly renovated rooms cute, clean and comfy.  Please accept our apologies for the disruption caused by the housekeeping staff.  We appreciate your feedback.

review.title: Nice hotel close to the airport
review.reviewText: The hotel was pretty nice for the money. The gentleman let us know when we got there we would be staying in one of the newly renovated rooms and to let then know how the experience was. The room was cute, clean and comfy. My only complaint would be the housekeeping staff knocking on doors at 8am waking everyone in the same hallway up.  They also socialized right outside of our room even though we had the do no disturb sign on. They talked for more than a few minutes at a time every few minutes literally outside of our hotel door.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us!  We are happy to hear you found the rates reasonable and the staff welcoming.

review.reviewText: It was an amazing stay at the Hilton Garden Inn. It wasn't to pricy at all. The staff were all very welcoming.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for choosing the Hilton Garden Inn!  We are sorry to learn you had a bad experience with one of the shuttle drivers.  Our shuttle is operated by a third party and we certainly appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback giving us the opportunity to address the situation.

review.title: Felt obliged to give a review
review.reviewText: The front desk is great, rooms are great, location is great, only because of one shuttle service experience the trip became memorable for all the bad reasons (being nice with the review here).
review.positiveRemarks: front desk is great, rooms are clean, good location but the shuttle service has a particular driver who makes the trip(s) very uncomfortable!!!
review.negativeRemarks: One Shuttle driver made whole experience a very difficult one to forget(being nice with review)Its a shame because the front desk and hotel is amazing

managementResponses.response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay.  We are happy to hear you found the sheets extremely comfortable.

review.title: The bed sheets were extremely comfortable
review.reviewText: The bed sheets were extremely comfortable.  Best I've ever felt.

managementResponses.response: We are happy to hear you had a pleasant stay with us!

review.reviewText: pleasant  it was a good experience the  place is quiet & beautiful , san Francisco is charming

managementResponses.response: We appreciate your review and happy to hear you found the staff attentive and helpful as well as the room clean.  We hope to see you again when your travels bring you through SFO.

review.title: Reasonably priced hotel near the airport with good
review.reviewText: The staff were very attentive and helpful. Rooms and bathroom were clean. It is close to the airport and fairly close to the main tourist attractions. Will definitely stay here again.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay Melissa.  We are sorry to learn of the issue you had with the shower in your room.  We appreciate your feedback and kind comments regarding the "amazing" staff.

review.title: not too far away from many attractions
review.reviewText: the hotel was clean and bright. the staff was amazing. I did wish, however, that the shuttle went to other places than just the airport. we used Uber for our transportation, and the prices were reasonable. they did put us in a handicap accessible room, and water got all over the floor during a shower. that is why I rated it a 4. also, after a day, the bathroom started to smell like a sewer, and the maintenance man said he couldn't fix it because how the floor of the shower was. that was disappointing. that's why I rated that a 4. I also wished they would have offered food service throughout the day, not just for breakfast and dinner. I paid $129 per night. not sure if it was worth that.
review.positiveRemarks: the staff was friendly and helped finding local amenities
review.negativeRemarks: the smell of 3rd floor at night and the shower spray on the floor.
review.locationRemarks: lots of restaurants nearby with different types of food. not far from the airport. 10-15 minutes away, with Uber, from Pier 39.
